extendedInfo.description: Binaural beats stimulates your brain by sending special auditory artifacts directly into your headphones to produce subtle changes in behavior though entraiment of brainwaves frequency.This app can help induce relaxation, creativity and many other desirable mental states.*WARNING*Binaural beats are very powerful and new presets must be experienced carefully, in a safe environment. But rest assured, I have been using binaural tones for a few years now with great success and without any concern.This application is 100% free and open source as a way to give back and create a large community of users, enjoy!*Getting involved*Anyone can participate and make this app better, I am looking for people to help on graphics, sounds, tone presets, documentation, video tutorial, ideas as well as developers!Please join the community at http://on.fb.me/lBDvPKSource code on github: http://bit.ly/BBeatsNow automatically pause and resume if a phone call arrives.This is why PHONE_STATE permissions are required. The app doesn't have internet access so there's no chance of sniffing numbers.I cannot reply to review comments because there is no way to do it, so please email me any feedback. I reply to all well-written feedback.

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.comment: This is a great application and its free. I also like that its open source. Minus 2 stars for the new read phone state and identity permission. The app was fine before
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best binaural app on the market
reviews.comment: A lot of apps make promises. This app delivers. The self-hypnosis track is my favorite. Only requests would be 1) to allow a playlist so people can stack tracks. 2) To allow people to browse the program while playing a track, as opposed to having to stop the track just to browse the program. This is an amazing (and totally free) app that I will definitely recommend to friends.
reviews.author: Dan Rogul

reviews.title: Altered States w/o drugs
reviews.comment: Brain states that takes meditation years of practice to achieve, what\'s not to like? Don\'t expect a joy ride, effects are powerful but subtle.
reviews.author: Lillie Bennett

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: I am so thankful for this app.  It truly works.  I recommend this for anyone who could use a good night sleep.
reviews.author: Tamara Miller

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: This is so very helpful! Thanks for this app! It\'s really well-organized. You guys should try if this app works on your brain! I\'m a student and it helps me to study, create, and most of all, it helps me a lot improving my mathematical skill!
reviews.author: Roxette Realiza

reviews.title: This is really neat..!
reviews.comment: The LSD one made me feel super awake and alert, and I\'m really interested in how this all works. Personally, the \"white noise\" made me feel a little uneasy and anxious at first, but as you relax you can really feel a difference.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: heckyes!
reviews.comment: I\'ve been using binaural therapy on and off for years, and have therefore tried many if not all of the free apps on the android market...this one is by far my favorite, as it offers 7 categories (healing, meditation, stimulation, out of body experience, learning, hypnosis, and sleep), and a total of 15 tracks. Plus, there\'s a forum, which allows you to get more involved in binaural therapy, and really adds a community aspect to this application, making it even more exciting to use.
reviews.author: Caitlin Eleanor Field

reviews.title: Powerful. Sublime!
reviews.comment: I\'ve tried several apps like this. I find this one to be the most thorough. Explanations for each pattern are clear and patterns themselves are powerful.
reviews.author: Jens Rasmussen

reviews.title: The Best
reviews.comment: Binaural Beats Therapy has high quality stereo tracks with no clicks. If you are looking for an app like this it\'s the 1 to get. The developer gives you several tracks that can be customized or left as is and each track has its own timing so you don\'t have to mess with timers. The developer is an expert in Binaural Beats thearpy and has does an unbelievable job developing this app. Most of all he\'s offered it for free with no ads. I use it everyday and it\'s really a great help.
reviews.author: Bekkie Sanchez

reviews.title: Awesome but flawed
reviews.comment: I love the program and the beats are perfect. However beats have a timer then they end. I dont fall asleep fast enough to use some of these, plus theres no way to \'auto repeat\' or extend them once they end while i sleep. Also i could do with a lower frequency beats that don\'t sound so loud. Will change rate to 5 just for an \'auto repeat\' function though.
reviews.author: Jeff Nordvik

reviews.title: Needs more, but still one of the best...
reviews.comment: It needs to tell the Hz, and maybe a few more options, such as 12-15Hz Beta (low) for ADD/ADHD/Mild Autism treatment.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Really works well
reviews.comment: First night after back surgery, nurse was a little slow with pain medicine. Listened to this and it really made a huge difference
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Great app, can someone combine sleep induction then lucid dreaming and possibly extend it? I find it hard it get the full benefit of the lucid one since it can take me awhile to fall asleep. Otherwise great!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Brilliant!
reviews.comment: Keep up the outstanding work! It\'s best app that I\'ve ever downloaded! I feel like a very heavy burden has been lifted off my shoulders! Thank you!
reviews.author: Richard Ngwato

reviews.title: How???
reviews.comment: How do you sleep with headphones in? Most uncomfortable thing ever. Also how can you sleep with noise? Even with volume right down it just kept me awake until it was finished.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Incredible!
reviews.comment: I use this app for work (highest mental activity) and sleep (sleep induction). I love the variety of choices that have been icluded. My thanks and appreciation to the developer and the contributors of each preset for making life more zen for me.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The best free mental aid!
reviews.comment: This app is so good I can\'t believe its a free resource. Different settings allow you to have specified experiences. And the community is always there to help you reach the next level.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: I use the learning mode, it instantly feels like my brain is boosted to higher mental activity.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not sure
reviews.comment: I feel weird sometimes. But Im not sure if that is just anxiety. Feeling like it is more Or less placebo.
reviews.author: Grant Koehler

reviews.title: Did nothing for me.
reviews.comment: I\'ve listen to all the beats now in this app and they do nothing for me. When sleeping it kept waking me up throught the entire night.  I\'ve tried lots of beats through different apps and none works for me.
reviews.author: Tony Harrison
